title: Biometric Credentials
not_available_description: Your device or browser does not support biometric authentication. Please use a compatible device or browser.
credentials_description: Biometric credentials registered for your account
no_credentials: You don't have any biometric credentials yet
security_note: Biometric data never leaves your device. Only a secure reference is stored on our servers.
privacy_note: You can remove biometric credentials at any time. This won't affect your account security.
verify_description: Please enter your password to continue
add_description: Register a new biometric credential for faster and more secure login
credential_name_help: Choose a name that helps you identify this device or credential

instructions.step1: Enter a name for this credential
instructions.step2: Click 'Register' and follow your device's biometric prompts
instructions.step3: Keep your finger on the sensor or look at the camera when prompted

remove_description: Are you sure you want to remove the credential '{name}'?
remove_warning: You will need to re-register this device if you want to use biometric authentication again.

errors.not_available: Biometric authentication is not available on this device
